properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2 v4 c1 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Watu na wakushukuru)
watu na wakushukuru
Ee Mungu,
watu wote
na wakushukuru. x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Watu na wakushukuru
(Ee Mungu) watu,
na wakuskukuru
(watu wote)
Ee Mungu watu
na wakushukuru na
wakushukuru. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mungu na atufadhili,
na kutubariki,
na kutuangazia uso wake.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Njia yake ijulikane,
duniani kote,
wokovu wake
katikati ya mataifa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mataifa washangilie,
naam waimbe kwa furaha,
maana kwa haki
utawahukumu watu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mungu atatubariki,
atatubariki sisi,
miisho yote
ya dunia itamcha yeye.
